name: ! S U B !
description:
!S U B! is a top down, retro-styled PC game where you use directional commands to influence your submarine's trajectory! You are to assign commands to transmission towers within the level using cardinal directions and these would influence the submarine's path to follow.

This game was made during the Global Game Jam 2018 at NSI Tafe in Sydney, Australia.

Team members:

Sean Simon - Programming

Facundo Calderon - Pixel Art and Level Designer

Andrew Giacca  -  Programmer and Game Designer

Jody Toomey - Sound Designer
